subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Dontrelle Willis is the Florida Marlins’ most popular player, which makes him the franchise’s biggest bargaining chip in its game of political roulette over a new retractable-roof stadium.
snippet: Pitcher Dontrelle Willis is the Florida Marlins’ most popular player, which makes him the franchise’s biggest bargaining chip in its game of political roulette over a new retractable-roof stadium.
